snippet: An officer for the Central Intelligence Agency was killed on Saturday in a suicide bombing in southern Afghanistan, American officials said Tuesday.
abstract: Central Intelligence Agency officer is killed in a suicide bombing in southern Afghanistan, by a guard working for the Afghan intelligence service.
lead_paragraph: An officer for the Central Intelligence Agency was killed on Saturday in a suicide bombing in southern Afghanistan, American officials said Tuesday.

headline.main: C.I.A. Officer Among Dead in Bombing by Afghan
headline.print_headline: C.I.A. Officer Among Dead In Bombing By Afghan
